sentences.en: About this there is unanimity among the historians.
sentences.cn: 关于这一点,那些历史学家的看法一致.
所有决定都需要全体一致同意。

sentences.en: All our opinions are tending to unanimity.
His views on knowledge economy have been accepted with unanimity.
sentences.cn: 他关于知识经济的观点得到一致工人.

sentences.en: In almost every discussion there is bound to be some disagreement, Don't expect unanimity.
sentences.cn: 几乎每一讨论都会有意见不合的情形产生, 别期待全体一致,毫无异议.

sentences.en: Members of both parties accepted our proposals with unanimity.
sentences.cn: 双方成员一致同意接受我们的建议.

sentences.en: New features could only be added to the language only when all committee members reached unanimity.
sentences.cn: 只有委员会成员达成一致,Lua才能添加新的语言特性.

sentences.en: Nothing marred the unanimity of the proceedings.
sentences.cn: 议事未受任何阻碍获得一致通过.

sentences.en: Our discussions led to complete unanimity.
sentences.cn: 我们的讨论取得了完全一致的意见.

sentences.en: The council reached unanimity on the third day of deliberations.
sentences.cn: 安理会在商议的第三天达成一致意见.

sentences.en: There is no unanimity among surgeons concerning the most effective and safest operative techniques.
sentences.cn: 关于最有效与最安全的手术方法,在外科医师中尚无一致认识.

sentences.en: These discussions have led to a remarkable unanimity.
sentences.cn: 这些讨论导致引人注目的一致意见.

sentences.en: They have reached unanimity on who will be the presidential candidate for the next general election.
sentences.cn: 他们就推举下界总统候选人取得了一致意见.

sentences.en: Unanimity was attained after the discussion ended after three hours.
sentences.cn: 在三个小时的讨论结果后,全体一致同意.

words.tran_cn: 全体一致的；意见一致的；无异议的

trans.tran_en: a state or situation of complete agreement among a group of people
